title: Dollarama reports 2% rise in quarterly profit
text:
Dollarama reports 2% rise in quarterly profit

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 12, 2019 07:21)

© Reuters. Dollarama reports 2% rise in quarterly profit Sept 12 (Reuters) - Canadian discount store operator Dollarama Inc reported a 2% rise in quarterly profit on Thursday, boosted by higher comparable-store sales and opening of new stores. The Montreal-based company's net income rose to C$143.2 million ($108.61 million), or 45 Canadian cents per share, in the second quarter ended Aug. 4, from C$140.4 million, or 42 Canadian cents, a year earlier. rose to C$946.4 million from C$868.5 million. ($1 = C$1.3185)

Dollarama reports 2% rise in quarterly profit
description: Dollarama reports 2% rise in quarterly profit
